description:
Go to https://tryfum.com/LAOWHY and use code LAOWHY to save an additional 10% off your order today

The Social Credit System has hit social media in China, and it's pretty dystopian. I break down the new rules and punishments. 

◘ Support me on Patreon to talk to me directly and support my work - http://www.patreon.com/laowhy86

Weekly Live show The China Show - https://www.youtube.com/@thechinashow

My documentaries - 
◘ Conquering Northern China:
https://vimeo.com/ondemand/conqueringnorthernchina
◘ Conquering Southern China
https://vimeo.com/ondemand/conqueringsouthernchina

title: “Don’t Be Hot or Weird” - China’s New Social Credit System's Dystopian Rules and Punishments
